Hi,
We're two students and our task is to find a NN that is able to
control=
 a hexapod robot. To find a suitable NN, we want to use a
Genetic Algorithm=
. Inputs for the NN are leg positions, ground contact
sensors for each leg,=
 desired walking speed and so on. Outputs of the
NN are the next positions =
for all the joints.

Know my question:
Within the XOR-Example (I runned NEA=
TGATrainingManager) the Neural Net
will be trained with data provided by th=
e xor/xor.csv file. 
In our Application (robot) we don't have any training =
data available,
we just want to evolve neural networks and evaluate them by=
 applying
the fitness function. (for example how fast walks the robot,
dire=
ction, etc.) How do we start NEAT, so that it does not need a
trainig set? =
Is there an example/tutorial available that shows how to
use NEAT without a=
 training set? Unfortunately, I couldn't work it out
so far how to do it.

=
Thanks a lot for any information!

Iwan
